author: cnbc.com
title: TempWorks Software® CEO Celebrates Leadership Milestone
text:
EAGAN, Minn., March 28, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- TempWorks Software, a premier staffing software provider for more than 20 years, is proud to announce a decade of growth and success under the leadership of its CEO, David Dourgarian. Since becoming president of TempWorks in 2008 and CEO in 2012, Dourgarian has helped the company grow from 40 employees to 133 employees with a 178% growth in client base for the software and funding divisions. With his continued emphasis on providing clients with innovative solutions and world-class support, TempWorks continues to grow and expand its client base and the depth of product offerings to meet the needs of the rapidly evolving staffing industry.
“It’s been incredible to witness the transformation that TempWorks has experienced under David’s influence and leadership,” says Casey Kraus, President at TempWorks Software. “Over the last decade, David has always demonstrated his understanding of the importance of listening to client feedback and taking risks when it comes to development. This ability has helped TempWorks grow into the successful and respected company that it is today.”
Over the last year, Dourgarian has strategically focused the TempWorks product development roadmap on optimizing tools for a mobile workforce. In 2017, TempWorks released Beyond™, a complete mobile ATS and CRM browser-based solution that is the next evolution of the Enterprise Infinity™ software solution. In 2018, TempWorks released the staffing industry’s first native mobile application for employee engagement, TempWorks Buzz™. By striving to develop innovative new tools to increase reach and efficiency for the staffing industry, Dourgarian will continue to propel TempWorks forward as a leading provider of staffing software solutions for the industry.
About TempWorks Software
Based in Eagan, Minnesota, independently-owned TempWorks Software has been a leading provider of staffing software solutions for more than 20 years. With an emphasis on exemplary client service, TempWorks consistently delivers innovative and cutting-edge technology to hundreds of temporary staffing agencies across the nation.
